author: danielf
msg: Added OSGi based block protocol. It is globally registered through the OSGi URL service and available with java.net.URL, see TestServlet2 for examples. It is not working completely yet. Other blocks and the own block are called through the protocol but something goes wrong with the output stream, so there is no output yet.

author: djd
msg: DERBY-1102 (partial) Remove test case of use of stale TriggerExecutionContext in triggerGeneral.sql
because applications no longer have access to the TriggerExecutionContext.

author: scolebourne
msg: Fix compilation error by using standard junit fail method

author: billbarker
msg: Since Ant publishes junit, it needs to be the old one, or projects can't use the old one
